entry.tran: (用水果、醋、糖和香料制作的)酸辣酱
entry.def: Chutney is a cold sauce made from fruit, vinegar, sugar, and spices. It is sold in jars and you eat it with meat or cheese.

means.word_mean: 1. chopped fruits or green tomatoes cooked in vinegar and sugar with ginger and spices
